original_text: Even the sea monsters draw out the breast, they give suck to their young ones: the daughter of my people is become cruel, like the ostriches in the wilderness.
korean_text: 들개들도 젖을 주어 그들의 새끼를 먹이나 딸 내 백성은 잔인하여 마치 광야의 타조 같도다

sentences.original_text: Even the sea monsters draw out the breast
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 바다 괴물들도 젖을 내어 놓고

sentences.original_text: they give suck to their young ones
the daughter of my people is become cruel
like the ostriches in the wilderness
